name: 尤信程
objective:
本課程主要探討下列音訊編碼技術：MPEG-1/2/4,包含編碼與解碼技巧。
課程內容涵蓋下列項目:
1. Review of digital signal processing
2. Introduction to psychoacoustics
3. Overview of MPEG-1 standard
4. Encoding of MPEG-1 L1 audio
5. Encoding of MPEG-1 L2 audio
6. Encoding of MPEG-1 L3 audio
7. Decoding of MPEG-1 audio
8. Introduction to MPEG-2 MC audio (L2)
9. Introduction to MPEG-2 AAC
10. Tools and profiles of MPEG-2 AAC
11. Introduction to MPEG-4 audio
12. In depth study of some tools: PNS, LTP, SBR, PS
13. Brief overview of AC-3 and DTS
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Introduction to psychoacoustics
Week 3. MPEG-1 overview
Week 4. MPEG-1 L1 audio
Week 5. MPEG-1 L2 audio
Week 6-7. MPEG-1 L3 audio
Week 8. Decoding and implementation considerations
Week 9 Overview of psychoacoustics model 2.
Week 10 MT
Week 11 MPEG-2 L2 MC audio
Week 12 MPEG-2 AAC
Week 13 Tools: TNS, Prediction, coupling, gain control
Week 14 MPEG-4 audio
Week 15-16 Tools: PNS, LTP, SBR, PS
Week 17 AC-3 and DTS
Week 18 Final
materials:
No textbook.
Lecture notes available.
Reference materials available.
